Having relatively recently jumped back into the fray, I'm not aware of JJ's military history. Can you enlighten me JJ?

 
 Certainly. I enlisted right after high school into the US Navy at the age of 18. Was in the delayed entry program for a year while in high school thus obtaining the rank of E-2 after basic.
 
 I graduated basic training on ironically September 11, 2006. Needless to say it was one of the proudest moments of my life... If Archie needs some evidence I'll gladly post a photo of me and my entire family that day visiting Great Lakes..
 
 I underwent Intel Specialist training at Dam Neck Virginia. Afterwords I was assigned to PCD Mesa Verde LPD 19 stationed in Norfolk Virginia. I then was transferred with the rest of the crew to where the ship was actually built in Pascagoula Mississippi and underwent shipboard training and other various tasks for the commission of the ship.
 I am an original Plank owner for this vessel and was part of the original commissioned crew.
 
 After Christmas leave is when the attack took place. I was transferred to shore command at Naval Station Norfolk and spent 8 months on shore duty before being honorably discharged on August 14, 2008.

And I almost had soda coming out of my nose cause man he could lay that accent on thick and thought he was bringing his game.... He had no chance but still I just laughed cause he thought he was all that.

 Nope. Some get called to new York other ships go to other places. It's basically bringing July 4th to people all over the coast, east and west. New York is just the most publicized. 
 
 It was great though cause it was on the USS Nassau so I was getting seamanship training and we were not part of the actual crew so in port we had no watch.
 
 3 days of lobster, clubbing, booze, cigars, and a 30 year old Canadian nurse.... Yeah that was the last time I did anything strait lol....
 
 Oh and she had blond hair, blue eyes, a nice place to hang your guns (yes i am implying the term) and.... 7 red bull vodkas later... giggity giggity.....

An article? Archie my medical records are held where every other veterans are kept after service... I'm still trying to obtain them personally and for some reason the VA cannot locate them...
 
 Assumed? No Archie they did NOT assume for fun.... There was deep seeded hatred...
 
 XXXXXXXX. I said I felt that camaraderie not they. I felt shocked and betrayed that people would do this to their own fellow Sailors and brothers in arms... Don;t believe me that these attacks are real? Read about August Provost or other Seaman killed for being Gay...
 
 Your a liar and a fool.... JUST because my views are different than yours gives you NO right to question my patriotism....
 
 It's the same mindset you share for us all Archie. Just because I stand up for who I am and squarely face your stupidity and prejudice in all it's form just makes me a direct target for your malice...
 
 He was not. However he was an E-5 or a petty officer second class therefor he had seniority. Also, I bunked and berthed with these other people so they had direct access to me and where I lived...
 
 Smell test? Archie if someone put an odor in front of you and it was different from what you THINK it should smell you'd deny it till you were blue in the face... The same goes for your beliefs...
 
 Nice try? I do not have to explain anything to you! If anything I can say he was very effeminate. I however was not. I believe word got around possibly through him or rumors that I was gay and these people enacted upon it. If you forget which you often do, I was still in the closet even to myself at the time.....
 
 Version? Perhaps you would like to question my attackers? Or rather pin a metal on their chest? 
 
 Yes they do because you discredit my service and dishonor three generations of my family that have fought for this nation. You discredit and make a mockery out of an incident that will haunt me for the rest of my life. You have not a clue of the trials I face daily...
 
 Perhaps you want to read the VA reports concerning my Post Traumatic Stress Disorder? Perhaps you'd like to watch my many restless nights to where I wake up in cold sweats or my mood swings where I lash out at others in an inexplicable manner due to my own inner turmoil...
 
 I do not need to share any of this with anyone but perhaps you will better understand that this is real and true and not a fantasy or fabrication.... But you do not care. All you care about is scoring points for your own grim self satisfaction.
 
 And going so far as to discredit my service and my heart and where it lies in loyalty to my creator, my country, and my soul is the greatest form of debauchery I can even think of..... 
 
 Fool.... narrow minded carrion picking fool.... It was honorable due to medical conditions. Once my command found out WHY I was beaten they gave me two choices.
 
 One keep quiet and get an honorable discharge so the command saves face, or I get kicked out under DADT and get nothing.... I chose the latter.
 
 Think about it. A brand new command with a brand new warship having attacks within their own crew a mere 3 weeks after commission... Think about it and how that would tarnish the ship and the crew.... But you don't think only try to conjure up ways to spread spin and lies about other people you loathe, that much is clear...

And with that said, I take no issue with any past generations of your family line which may have served.  Conservatives are hurling invective and accusations against our nation's president instead of uniting behind him as liberals stood in unity with President George W. Bush after the attacks on our nation on September 11, 2001. 
 Conservatives want to weaken America. They want to destroy America.

In fairness, the Left did rally around GW after 9-11. To do otherwise would have surely been political suicide, so their motives in doing so were obvious, self-preservation. But as soon as public rancor subsided, the left was back to its old ways.

 
 Surely, though, you remember about how after weeks of warning, along with a mandatory evacuation, people blamed Bush for not warning the residents of New Orleans about Hurricane Katrina, many of them accusing him of having bombs planted on the levees to kill as many black people as possible. The latter accusation is paranoid, stupid, and desperate. And if a mandatory evacuation isn't a warning, I don't know what is. Bush did just about everything in his power to save human lives; the left just used him as their scapegoat, as usual.
 
 The other thing is, no disaster at the same scale as 9-11 has happened under the Obama presidency (yet), so we should be able to disagree with Obama on most issues without taking any serious criticism. Of course, the left-wing media makes this impossible.

 The fact is that we have been told a story by an anonymous person who goes by the name jazyjason, and nothing more at this point. I have no reason to believe anything this guy has said, and in no way am obligated to believe his version of events regarding this alleged beat down. For all I know it's a complete work of fiction designed to garner more sympathy for homosexuals who do nothing but claim a victim status by the mean straights.

In one sentence he speaks about the honor and camaraderie of soldiers, then he calls these so called attackers ignorant rednecks.  So you can think anything you like about me snakespit, I welcome the condemnation from you as it means nothing because once again in case you missed it, this is a totally virtual yet anonymous reality. In other words, it isn't the real world.
